name: YITH Frequently Bought Together for WooCommerce
author: YITH

sections.description:
YITH Frequently Bought Together for WooCommerce allows you to display an upsell section on the product page, suggest related items (usually bought together) and increase your store conversions.

It’s an effective strategy for encouraging your customers to add more items to their cart and increase the value of their order. Amazon A/B testing has shown that displaying related and complementary products and offering a discount for purchasing multiple products in the same order can increase conversions by 10-15%

How does it work?

Installing and configuring the products you want to suggest for combined purchase is all you need to start building a targeted upsell strategy in your store.
Full documentation is available here.

Free version options

  • Configure the product suggestions for each product in your store
  • Customize the title of the “Frequently Bought Together” section
  • Customize the text and colors of the “Add to Cart” button within the “Frequently bought together” section

Do you want to see the plugin in action? Check the live demo >

Need more? Get the premium version!

With the premium version you can unlock advanced features and enhance the user experience of your shop.

With the premium version you can:

  • Automatically suggest products from specific tags and/or categories
  • Automatically suggest upsell or cross-sell products
  • Choose whether or not to show all products or only a specific number randomly
  • Enable a discount (fixed or percentage) on the purchase of suggested products
  • Choose whether or not to show how much the user will save if discounted
  • Allow the user to select the variation (size, color, etc.) of the variable product within the modal
  • Select a location for the “Frequently Bought Together” section
  • Advanced text and color customization options
  • Redirect users to the Checkout page after adding to cart
  • Access our premium support area

Test the live demo of the premium version>

How can I report security bugs?

You can report security bugs through the Patchstack Vulnerability Disclosure Program. The Patchstack team help validate, triage and handle any security vulnerabilities. Report a security vulnerability.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate YITH WooCommerce Frequently Bought Together from Plugins page.

short_description: The YITH WooCommerce Frequently Bought Together plugin lets you add product suggestions with a simple summary in each product page.
